name: looking for
description:
A very simple meditative game for the #bitsyJam, inspired by the "little details" theme.

To play, click on the game window, then use the arrow keys or WASD to move around and interact.

This is my first game - I had a lot of fun learning how to use some of the basics of Bitsy.

Text taken from Chapter 47 of the Tao Te Ching, originally written by Lao-Tzu and translated for the public domain by j.h. mcdonald, 1996. 

Music by me.
